reviewText:
This is for the Movie, Top Bet. If you are looking for a Topbet Sportsbook review, try Betting411.

The movie starts out kind of slow, but it's definitely worth watching if you're in the mood for an Asian Mafia/Gambling type flick. Lot's of card-playing. A leader of the Triads tells a Saint that he has to play for him in a cards tournament. The Saint refuses and, as you can imagine, there is conflict.
